entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
